snippet: T plucks the best shoes right off the runway. Today's shoe: a monochromatic heel with a double ankle strap, sheer siding and pink leather toe cap would look prim if not for that sporty bandeau and stacked wooden heel.
abstract: T plucks the best shoes right off the runway. Today's shoe: a monochromatic heel with a double ankle strap, sheer siding and pink leather toe cap would look prim if not for that sporty bandeau and stacked wooden heel.
